summary:
Hi, my name is Raghav. 

I'm from the archipelagic island country known as Seychelles, with a passion for developing smart and sustainable engineering solutions.

Strengths: Control Systems | Computer-Aided Design | Linear/Non-Linear Modelling | Machine Learning
Software: SolidWorks | MATLAB | Simulink | ANSYS | Fusion 360 | MSC ADAMS | Python

awards: [{'title': 'BEng Final Year Project Prize', 'description': 'Awarded for my BEng dissertation comparing PID and Fuzzy controllers in cruise control systems.', 'issuer': 'University of Bradford', 'date': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, {'title': 'BEng Mechanical Engineering Programme Prize', 'description': 'Awarded for the best performance across all students on the Mechanical Engineering Programme.', 'issuer': 'University of Bradford', 'date': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, {'title': 'Humanitarian Efforts', 'description': 'One of the five students elected from across all GEMS schools in Dubai, to hand over a cheque of $373,517 towards renovating a school in Kibera, the largest slum in Africa.', 'issuer': 'The Winchester School, Jebel Ali, Dubai', 'date': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}]
projects:
[{'title': 'MSc: Wave Energy Converter: Power increase through control', 'date': {'start': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'description': '– Modelled a six degree-of-freedom wave energy converter in Simulink.
– Designed and implemented a complex-conjugate approximating PD controller, alongside an Extended
Kalman Filter, to maximise power generation, yielding power gains of upto 21%.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Raghav', 'last_name': 'Naidu', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Competence Process Engineer @ ASML'}]}, {'title': 'MSc: Conceptual Autonomous Search and Rescue Robot', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'description': '– Collaborated with five others to create the conceptual design of an autonomous search and rescue robot.
– Researched on the subsystem I took charge of, the locomotion system to identify which locomotion method would best suit our needs of operating over unstable terrain.
– Designed a 4 track system, including 2 main tracks and 2 auxiliary tracks for reorientation and climbing purposes.
– Designed the control system using an IMU to control the auxiliary tracks to protect the sensitive equipment atop the robot.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Raghav', 'last_name': 'Naidu', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Competence Process Engineer @ ASML'}]}, {'title': 'MSc: 2D Modelling of Vehicle Dynamics Systems', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2020}}, 'description': '– Developed a vehicle dynamics model using MATLAB and Simulink.
– Developed models for the individual wheel, suspension and body components.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Raghav', 'last_name': 'Naidu', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Competence Process Engineer @ ASML'}]}, {'title': 'BEng Y3: PID and Fuzzy Controller design for cruise control systems', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': '– Designed and implemented a PID and Fuzzy controller for cruise control system.
– Performed simulation of the developed vehicle model using MATLAB and Simulink.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Raghav', 'last_name': 'Naidu', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Competence Process Engineer @ ASML'}]}, {'title': 'BEng Y3: Prosthetic Arm for Indoor Bouldering', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': '- Lead and managed a team of 3. 
- SolidWorks and Microsoft Excel primarily used for designing and number crunching.
- Used the double-diamond design process to take the idea from a concept to a prototype.
- Wrote technical documentation of the design, detailing function, materials, dimensions and cost.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Raghav', 'last_name': 'Naidu', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Competence Process Engineer @ ASML'}]}, {'title': 'BEng Y2: Design and simulation of an excavator', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 4, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'description': '- Designed individual parts and created an assembly of an excavator and truck using SolidWorks.
- Used ADAMs to perform multi-body dynamics analysis on the motion of an excavator.
- Wrote a detailed report on the process of designing and simulating the excavator.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Raghav', 'last_name': 'Naidu', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Competence Process Engineer @ ASML'}]}, {'title': 'BEng Y1: Remote-controlled offroad vehicle', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'description': '- Lead and worked in a team of 6 to design, manufacture and test a remote-controlled vehicle that could perform on rocky surfaces.
- Effectively and simultaneously problem solved when issues were faced close to the deadline.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Raghav', 'last_name': 'Naidu', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Competence Process Engineer @ ASML'}]}]
